mapper.insert: insert into db_usershowconfig (ID, APIID, TITLE, COLUMNAME, SORT, NEEDFLAG, LENGTHFLAG, FILEDLENGTH, EMAILFLAG, TELFLAG, CONTENT, ORDERTYPE, 'VALUE') values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{apiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{needflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lengthflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{filedlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{emailflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{telflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_usershowconfig set APIID = #{apiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLUMNAME = #{columname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEEDFLAG = #{needflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LENGTHFLAG = #{lengthflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILEDLENGTH = #{filedlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMAILFLAG = #{emailflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TELFLAG = #{telflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERTYPE = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'VALUE' = #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, APIID, TITLE, COLUMNAME, SORT, NEEDFLAG, LENGTHFLAG, FILEDLENGTH, EMAILFLAG, TELFLAG, CONTENT, ORDERTYPE, 'VALUE' from db_usershowconfig where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, APIID, TITLE, COLUMNAME, SORT, NEEDFLAG, LENGTHFLAG, FILEDLENGTH, EMAILFLAG, TELFLAG, CONTENT, ORDERTYPE, 'VALUE' from db_usershowconfig
